newsitem.title: USA: QUILMES SEES FY 1996 RESULTS NEAR YEAR-AGO.
newsitem.headline: QUILMES SEES FY 1996 RESULTS NEAR YEAR-AGO.

text.p: Luxembourg brewing holding company Quilmes Industrial SA (Quinsa) said it expected 1996 fiscal year results to be "comparable" with fiscal 1995 results because of economic conditions in South America.
The company said that for 1996, sales had been roughly the same in Argentina and Paraguay, although lower in Chile. It said sales had been higher during the second half of 1996 in Uruguay.
